item.title: Tom Steyer is running for California governor as a populist billionaire
Trump speaks at U.S.-Saudi Investment Forum
item.description: Trump's appearance at the Kennedy Center came a day after he hosted Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman of Saudi Arabia at the White House.

item.title: Trump calls for ABC's license to be revoked after reporter asks about Jeffrey Epstein files
item.description: Trump insulted ABC News reporter Mary Bruce days after telling a female reporter to be "quiet, piggy," when she asked about Jeffrey Epstein.
